titleInfo.title: ‘SURVEY of the Northern or Munsooree Range together with the Isthmus of the Peninsula of ADEN’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink with wash on paperDimensions:828 x 1461 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Compiled and signed by a Special Committee on the Aden Defences formed of Engineers William Jacob and C.W. Grant, Bombay 11th September 1843.Relief shown by contours.Shows the proposed site of military camp in Aden with works recommended by Lieutenant J.A. Curtis to improve the defences against Arab and European attacks. Features including barracks, water supply reservoirs with pipes, a military road and coastline with proposed piers are delineated.Landmarks numbered for reference with a table of references dated ‘20th May 1843’ in bottom left-hand corner.Inscriptions:On verso in the upper-right is an annotation:‘Enclosure No. 3 In Bombay Secret No. 7 1844.Received Southampton13 March 1844’.Labels:On verso in the upper-right: 'EXAMINER'S OFFICE' with coat of arms. And below: '476'.
